snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday's selection includes a mobile first advocate addressing some of the difficulties of growth in the mobile sphere, a list of the year's...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday's selection includes a mobile first advocate addressing some of the difficulties of growth in the mobile sphere, a list of the year's most popular musicians in terms of blog posts and a look at the top earners in mobile apps.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: A Mobile Paradox, and the App Elite
